author: rhuijben
msg: Stop passing entries through most of the status calculation code; instead
just fetch it when assembling the final status structure.
This leaves a few entry retrievals that are used to fetch some properties,
which can be removed/switched to wc-ng as separate patches. Some of these
handle specific obstruction scenarios that are not easy to map to WC-NG
until we get to a single-db.
(assemble_status): Remove argument and remove entry locally.
(handle_dir_entry): Remove dir_entry handling and passing of entry. Keep
the stub handling to leave stat_tests.py 5 passing.

author: srowen
msg: Recommender and related jobs now exclusively use new Hadoop 0.20.x+ APIs

author: gdusbabek
msg: rename StreamCompletionAction to Action. patch by stuhood, reviwed by gdusbabek. CASSANDRA-1019

author: gdusbabek
